001package edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.service;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
005import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
006import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Dealer;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Field;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
011import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
012import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
013import io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Supplier;
014import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
015import io.reactivex.rxjava3.subjects.BehaviorSubject;
016import io.reactivex.rxjava3.subjects.Subject;
017import java.util.Random;
018import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
019import javax.inject.Inject;
020import javax.inject.Singleton;
021
022@Singleton
023public class PlayingFieldRepository {
024
025  private static final int MILLISECONDS_PER_SECOND = 1000;
026  private static final int DROP_ROWS_PER_TICK = 20;
027
028  private final Random rng;
029  private final MutableLiveData<Field> playingField;
030  private final MutableLiveData<Dealer> dealer;
031  private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> running;
032  private final Scheduler moveScheduler;
033  private final Scheduler tickScheduler;
034  private final Scheduler dropScheduler;
035
036  private Subject<Boolean> ticker;
037
038  @Inject
039  PlayingFieldRepository(@ApplicationContext Context context, Random rng) {
040    this.rng = rng;
041    playingField = new MutableLiveData<>();
042    dealer = new MutableLiveData<>();
043    running = new MutableLiveData<>();
044    moveScheduler = Schedulers.single();
045    tickScheduler = Schedulers.single();
046    dropScheduler = Schedulers.single();
047  }
048
049  public Completable create(int height, int width, int bufferSize, int queueSize) {
050    return Single.fromSupplier(() -> new Dealer(queueSize, rng))
051        .flatMap((dealer) ->
052            Single.fromSupplier(() -> new Field(height, width, bufferSize, dealer))
053                .doAfterSuccess((field) -> this.dealer.postValue(dealer))
054        )
055        .doAfterSuccess(playingField::postValue)
056        .doAfterSuccess((ignore) -> running.postValue(false))
057        .ignoreElement()
058        .subscribeOn(moveScheduler);
059  }
060
061  public Observable<Boolean> run() {
062    clearTicker();
063    Field field = playingField.getValue();
064    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
065    if (!field.isGameStarted()) {
066      field.start();
067      playingField.postValue(field);
068      dealer.postValue(dealer.getValue());
069    }
070    ticker = BehaviorSubject.createDefault(Boolean.TRUE);
071    return ticker
072        .doOnComplete(() -> running.postValue(false))
073        .filter(Boolean.TRUE::equals)
074        .doAfterNext((ignore) -> running.postValue(true))
075        .flatMap((running) -> Observable.just(running)
076            .delay(Math.round(field.getSecondsPerTick() * MILLISECONDS_PER_SECOND),
077                TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, tickScheduler))
078        .observeOn(moveScheduler)
079        .map((ignored) -> tick());
080  }
081
082  public void stop() {
083    clearTicker();
084  }
085
086  public Single<Boolean> moveLeft() {
087    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
088    return move(() -> playingField.getValue().moveLeft());
089  }
090
091  public Single<Boolean> moveRight() {
092    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
093    return move(() -> playingField.getValue().moveRight());
094  }
095
096  public Single<Boolean> rotateLeft() {
097    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
098    return move(() -> playingField.getValue().rotateLeft());
099  }
100
101  public Single<Boolean> rotateRight() {
102    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
103    return move(() -> playingField.getValue().rotateRight());
104  }
105
106  public Single<Boolean> moveDown(boolean freezeOnFailure) {
107    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
108    return move(() -> playingField.getValue().moveDown(freezeOnFailure));
109  }
110
111  public Completable drop(boolean hard) {
112    Field field = playingField.getValue();
113    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
114    return Completable.fromObservable(
115        Observable.interval(0, Math.round(
116                    field.getSecondsPerTick() * MILLISECONDS_PER_SECOND / DROP_ROWS_PER_TICK),
117                TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, dropScheduler)
118            .observeOn(moveScheduler)
119            .takeWhile((ignored) -> {
120              if (field.moveDown(hard)) {
121                return true;
122              } else {
123                dealer.postValue(dealer.getValue());
124                return false;
125              }
126            })
127            .doAfterNext((ignored) -> playingField.postValue(field))
128    );
129  }
130
131  public LiveData<Field> getPlayingField() {
132    return playingField;
133  }
134
135  public LiveData<Dealer> getDealer() {
136    return dealer;
137  }
138
139  public LiveData<Boolean> getRunning() {
140    return running;
141  }
142
143  private Single<Boolean> move(Supplier<Boolean> supplier) {
144    Field field = playingField.getValue();
145    return Single.fromSupplier(supplier)
146        .doAfterSuccess((success) -> {
147          if (success) {
148            playingField.postValue(field);
149          }
150        })
151        .subscribeOn(moveScheduler);
152  }
153
154  private boolean tick() {
155    Field field = playingField.getValue();
156    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
157    boolean moved = field.moveDown(true);
158    if (!moved) {
159      dealer.postValue(dealer.getValue());
160    }
161    playingField.postValue(field);
162    boolean stillRunning = moved || !field.isGameOver();
163    if (stillRunning) {
164      ticker.onNext(Boolean.TRUE);
165    } else {
166      clearTicker();
167    }
168    return stillRunning;
169  }
170
171  private void clearTicker() {
172    if (ticker != null && !ticker.hasComplete()) {
173      ticker.onComplete();
174    }
175    ticker = null;
176  }
177
178
179}
